Ingredients.2: 1 (5.7 ounce) package Knorr® Rice Sides™ - Cheddar Broccoli

Ingredients.4: 1 (15 ounce) can kidney beans, rinsed and drained

Directions.2: Cook ground beef in 12-inch nonstick skillet over medium-high heat, stirring occasionally, until beef is done, about 5 minutes. Remove beef mixture and set aside.

Directions.3: Stir Knorr® Rice Sides™ - Cheddar Broccoli, water and beans into same skillet and bring to a boil over high heat. Reduce heat to medium and cook covered 7 minutes or until rice is tender. Stir in beef mixture. Remove from heat and let stand 2 minutes. Stir in 1/2 cup salsa and 1/2 cup cheese.

Directions.4: Spoon about 3/4 cup rice mixture onto each tortilla; roll-up.

Directions.5: Evenly spread 1/2 cup salsa in bottom of 13 x 9-inch greased baking dish. Arrange burritos, seam-side-down. Spoon remaining salsa down center of burritos, then sprinkle with remaining 1/2 cup cheese. Cover tightly with aluminum foil and bake 25 minutes or until heated through. Garnish with green onions.
